description: Making sticky date pudding has never been easier. This tray-baked version is the real deal. Whip it up for your next dessert and serve with a dollop of cream.
name: Self-saucing sticky date pudding traybake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make the caramel sauce, place brown sugar, butter and 1 1/2 cups boiling water in a large jug. Stir until butter has melted. Stand for 10 minutes to cool slightly. Slowly pour mixture over back of a large metal spoon to cover batter. Bake for 35 minutes or until pudding bounces back when gently touched. Dust with icing sugar and dollop with cream. Serve immediately.

Slowly pour mixture over back of a large metal spoon to cover batter. Bake for 35 minutes or until pudding bounces back when gently touched. Dust with icing sugar and dollop with cream. Serve immediately.
